CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Project_Type__c,"Customer Project"), IF( pse__Billable__c, "1. Project Work - Billable", "2. Project Work - Non-Billable" ), IF( pse__Project__r.pse__Time_Credited__c, "3. Internal Productive", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Task_Code__c,"TO01- Vacation"), ISPICKVAL(Task_Code__c,"TO02- Paid designated holiday"), ISPICKVAL(Task_Code__c,"TO03- Paid time not worked"), ISPICKVAL(Task_Code__c,"TO03- Paid Personal Time Off") ), "5. Time Off", "4. Internal" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Work Category
